data.name: The Six Dragons
data.detailed_description:
Info

The Six Dragons is an Open World RPG that features a huge Procedurally Generated World of 64km2, 1 Billion Randomly Generated Dungeons, in-depth Crafting system, harvesting, epic fights, open build class system and much more. Also, an engaging story/quest line is on the way for the Final Release of the game.


Features in Early Access

  • World: Full 64km2 Semi-Procedural world available
  • Dungeons: 1 Billion Randomly Generated Dungeons
  • Skills: 42 skills available in Early Access
  • Harvest/Craft: Full Harvesting and Craft available (over 300 recipes in Early Access)
  • Classes: Full custom builds available with Skill from 3 Classes (Wizard, Warrior, Cleric) more to be added
  • Quests: Not available yet (only introductory Quest Available), plan to implement side quests soon
  • Leveling: full player levels available (60)
  • Chests: Loot Chests available
  • Loot: Full Loot tables available but balancing is still under development


FAQ

Why the price is so low?

The Six Dragons is not ready yet, the price will increase while more features are implemented.

How many people are in the development team?

The Six Dragons is under development by a solo developer in his basement, but people around the world help for many parts of the game, e.g Music, 3D art, Sound FX, Animations, Effects etc.

How is it possible to finish the game with 1 developer?

Even though the game is already in a late stage of development, Early Access has the purpose to support the developer hire more people to work on more parts of the game and make it as good as possible. Also, the tools available right now for the developers to use are more advanced and help a lot.

Will I enjoy the game? How many hours can I play? Should I buy it?

The game right now is for those old-school grinders that like killing stuff and get experience, items, materials, and harvest while exploring all around the world, then craft a bunch of items to get stronger, adjust their builds and fight difficult bosses. If you like this kind of gameplay then you can play for 50+ hours up to 100s of hours. If you are into quest and story-lines then you have to wait for the final game when the Story Mode of the game will be implemented. That said, is planned for side procedural generated quests to be implemented before final release.

What should I expect from Early Access the following months?

For the next 6 months the plan is to work in the following:

  • the first couple of months on Early Access will be about monster AI and skill improvements/balancing.
  • Implementation of the Mercenaries System, that you can hire them for gold and use them for various jobs like harvesting for you.
  • Animations polishing.
  • Random Generated side-quests.


Events

Even though The Six Dragons is a single player game, we would like the community to engage together, so weekly/monthly events are planned, with World Bosses spawning and challenge players. These monsters will be very hard to defeat and will not be level dependent (you won't have to be max level to participate, the Bosses will spawn at your level range)


Progression

The player will have plenty of ways to progress in-game. Leveling will be achieved via monsters killing, Quests, Crafting. Equipment will be gained from Monsters and Bosses, Treasure Chests, and finally Crafting. On Early Access, leveling is achieved mostly by hunting monsters.

data.short_description: The Six Dragons is an Open World RPG that features a huge Procedurally Generated World of 64km2, 1 Billion Randomly Generated Dungeons, in-depth Crafting system, harvesting, epic fights, open build class system and much more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955, Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870 with 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core, Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, Radeon R9 280X with 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, recommended system requirements may change.
